content.description: Throughout the world, especially the less-developed countries, burning wood or other biomass for heating or cooking in homes is common. One negative environmental impact of this practice is the production of particulates indoors, which can be a health hazard to humans.
content.question: Which of the following describes the best strategy for mitigating this potential problem?

choices.label: Installing effective ventilation systems in dwellings
Planting native plants around the dwelling
Equipping dwellings with rainwater collection systems

content.answer: Installing effective ventilation systems in dwellings

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Describe potential responses or approaches to environmental problems.
